org.descripter.js

Class Memory

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • org.descripter.js.Memory

  • public class Memory
extends java.lang.ClassLoader

    Represents a memory class loader to compile Java source code on the fly.

    Since:
    Descripter 1.0
    Author:
    J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.descripter.org

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • compile

        public java.lang.Boolean compile(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String code)

        Compiles the specified Java source.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the target class.
        code - The code of the Java source.
        Returns:
        true if the compilation is successful; false, otherwise.
        Since:
        Descripter 1.0
